name: The Rekindlers
description:
Together with a friend you will have to pass flames between each other in order to solve the puzzles. This is a small game that we made for a local game jam here in Sweden during a two week period.

Key Features

  • Over 1 hour of gameplay across three different worlds.
  • Fly through the environment as a ghost and reach areas that others can't.
  • Run and jump faster in order to deliver the flame before it passes out.
  • Change your shape to block environment from putting out your flame.

Words from testers

  • "This level is the Dark Souls of puzzle levels!"
  • "I f**king hate it!"
  • "Don't really like pumkins"
  • "I would love a water world!"
  • "Why have a boss if you can't die?"

  • "I never thought breaking ice like the fourth gif would be so rewarding"
